#include <stdio.h>
#include <iostream>

using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t,flag;
    long n,i;
    long long s,e,x,y;

    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        flag = 0;
        cin>>s>>e;
        cin>>n;
        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            cin>>x>>y;
            if(s<x&&e>x || y>s && y<e)
                flag=1;
        }
        if(flag)
            cout<<"NO\n";
        else
            cout<<"YES\n";

    }
    return 0;

}
